text: HeadSpin (https://headspin.io) - Senior Software Engineers & UI Engineers Full-time positions in our global headquarters, downtown Mountain View. Work with a distributed team on mobile device infrastructure and performance intelligence. Small team always pushing for more correct, more scalable, more usable, more capable, with many interesting problems to work on. Competitive compensation. Please apply directly to brien -at- headspin.io. The process is an initial call with a member of the team, then a small coding challenge.
